QueryResult.text: select g.dal_partition_code, p.depth, g.id view_id, g.code, dal_TYPE, dal_code from cmn_partitions p, cmn_grids g where g.dal_partition_code = p.code and g.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' union select g.dal_partition_code, -1 depth, g.id view_id, g.code, dal_TYPE, dal_code from cmn_grids g where g.dal_partition_code = 'NIKU.ROOT'
